description: This initiative focuses on empowering women in a rural community by promoting a unique brand that transforms Amazonian fruits into fashionable accessories and clothing. It originated from a vision to blend traditional craftsmanship with modern design, fostering economic independence among local women. The project not only highlights the cultural richness of the Amazon but also emphasizes sustainability by utilizing natural materials. By creating workshops and providing training, it aims to uplift the community, enhance local food systems, and preserve ancestral knowledge, ultimately contributing to social and environmental well-being.
name: SHUSKA
